  • titan_pylib.data_structures.dynamic_connectivity.link_cut_tree

titan_pylib.data_structures.dynamic_connectivity.link_cut_tree のソースコード

  1from array import array
  2from typing import Generic, List, TypeVar, Callable, Iterable, Union
  3T = TypeVar('T')
  4F = TypeVar('F')
  5


[ドキュメント]
  6class LinkCutTree(Generic[T, F]):
  7
  8  # パスクエリ全部載せLinkCutTree
  9  # - link / cut / merge / split
 10  # - prod / apply / getitem / setitem
 11  # - root / same
 12  # - lca / path_length / path_kth_elm
 13  # など
 14
 15  # opがいらないならupdateを即returnするように変更したり、
 16  # 可換opならupdateを短縮したりなど
 17
 18  def __init__(self,
 19               n_or_a: Union[int, Iterable[T]],
 20               op: Callable[[T, T], T],
 21               mapping: Callable[[F, T], T],
 22               composition: Callable[[F, F], F],
 23               e: T,
 24               id: F,
 25               ) -> None:
 26    self.op = op
 27    self.mapping = mapping
 28    self.composition = composition
 29    self.e = e
 30    self.id = id
 31    self.key: List[T] = [e] * (n_or_a) if isinstance(n_or_a, int) else list(n_or_a)
 32    self.n = len(self.key)
 33    self.key.append(e)
 34    self.data: List[T] = [x for x in self.key for _ in range(2)]
 35    self.lazy: List[F] = [id] * (self.n+1)
 36    self.arr: array[int] = array('I', [self.n, self.n, self.n, 0] * (self.n+1))
 37    # node.left  : arr[node<<2|0]
 38    # node.right : arr[node<<2|1]
 39    # node.par   : arr[node<<2|2]
 40    # node.rev   : arr[node<<2|3]
 41    self.size: array[int] = array('I', [1] * (self.n+1))
 42    self.size[-1] = 0
 43    self.group_cnt = self.n
 44
 45  def _is_root(self, node: int) -> bool:
 46    return (self.arr[node<<2|2] == self.n) or not (self.arr[self.arr[node<<2|2]<<2] == node or self.arr[self.arr[node<<2|2]<<2|1] == node)
 47
 48  def _propagate(self, node: int) -> None:
 49    if node == self.n: return
 50    arr = self.arr
 51    if arr[node<<2|3]:
 52      self.data[node<<1], self.data[node<<1|1] = self.data[node<<1|1], self.data[node<<1]
 53      arr[node<<2|3] = 0
 54      ln, rn = arr[node<<2], arr[node<<2|1]
 55      arr[node<<2] = rn
 56      arr[node<<2|1] = ln
 57      arr[ln<<2|3] ^= 1
 58      arr[rn<<2|3] ^= 1
 59    if self.lazy[node] == self.id:
 60      return
 61    lazy, data, key = self.lazy, self.data, self.key
 62    nlazy = lazy[node]
 63    lnode, rnode = arr[node<<2], arr[node<<2|1]
 64    if lnode != self.n:
 65      data[lnode<<1] = self.mapping(nlazy, data[lnode<<1])
 66      data[lnode<<1|1] = self.mapping(nlazy, data[lnode<<1|1])
 67      key[lnode] = self.mapping(nlazy, key[lnode])
 68      lazy[lnode] = nlazy if lazy[lnode] == self.id else self.composition(nlazy, lazy[lnode])
 69    if rnode != self.n:
 70      data[rnode<<1] = self.mapping(nlazy, data[rnode<<1])
 71      data[rnode<<1|1] = self.mapping(nlazy, data[rnode<<1|1])
 72      key[rnode] = self.mapping(nlazy, key[rnode])
 73      lazy[rnode] = nlazy if lazy[rnode] == self.id else self.composition(nlazy, lazy[rnode])
 74    lazy[node] = self.id
 75
 76  def _update(self, node: int) -> None:
 77    if node == self.n: return
 78    ln, rn = self.arr[node<<2], self.arr[node<<2|1]
 79    self._propagate(ln)
 80    self._propagate(rn)
 81    self.data[node<<1] = self.op(self.op(self.data[ln<<1], self.key[node]), self.data[rn<<1])
 82    self.data[node<<1|1] = self.op(self.op(self.data[rn<<1|1], self.key[node]), self.data[ln<<1|1])
 83    self.size[node] = 1 + self.size[ln] + self.size[rn]
 84
 85  def _update_triple(self, x: int, y: int, z: int) -> None:
 86    data, key, arr, size = self.data, self.key, self.arr, self.size
 87    lx, rx = arr[x<<2], arr[x<<2|1]
 88    ly, ry = arr[y<<2], arr[y<<2|1]
 89    self._propagate(lx)
 90    self._propagate(rx)
 91    self._propagate(ly)
 92    self._propagate(ry)
 93    data[z<<1] = data[x<<1]
 94    data[x<<1] = self.op(self.op(data[lx<<1], key[x]), data[rx<<1])
 95    data[y<<1] = self.op(self.op(data[ly<<1], key[y]), data[ry<<1])
 96    data[z<<1|1] = data[x<<1|1]
 97    data[x<<1|1] = self.op(self.op(data[rx<<1|1], key[x]), data[lx<<1|1])
 98    data[y<<1|1] = self.op(self.op(data[ry<<1|1], key[y]), data[ly<<1|1])
 99    size[z] = size[x]
100    size[x] = 1 + size[lx] + size[rx]
101    size[y] = 1 + size[ly] + size[ry]
102
103  def _update_double(self, x: int, y: int) -> None:
104    data, key, arr, size = self.data, self.key, self.arr, self.size
105    lx, rx = arr[x<<2], arr[x<<2|1]
106    self._propagate(lx)
107    self._propagate(rx)
108    data[y<<1] = data[x<<1]
109    data[x<<1] = self.op(self.op(data[lx<<1], key[x]), data[rx<<1])
110    data[y<<1|1] = data[x<<1|1]
111    data[x<<1|1] = self.op(self.op(data[rx<<1|1], key[x]), data[lx<<1|1])
112    size[y] = size[x]
113    size[x] = 1 + size[lx] + size[rx]
114
115  def _splay(self, node: int) -> None:
116    # splayを抜けた後、nodeは遅延伝播済みにするようにする
117    # (splay後のnodeのleft,rightにアクセスしやすいと非常にラクなはず)
118    if node == self.n: return
119    _propagate, _is_root, _update_triple = self._propagate, self._is_root, self._update_triple
120    _propagate(node)
121    if _is_root(node): return
122    arr = self.arr
123    pnode = arr[node<<2|2]
124    while not _is_root(pnode):
125      gnode = arr[pnode<<2|2]
126      _propagate(gnode)
127      _propagate(pnode)
128      _propagate(node)
129      f = arr[pnode<<2] == node
130      g = (arr[gnode<<2|f] == pnode) ^ (arr[pnode<<2|f] == node)
131      nnode = (node if g else pnode) << 2 | f ^ g
132      arr[pnode<<2|f^1] = arr[node<<2|f]
133      arr[gnode<<2|f^g^1] = arr[nnode]
134      arr[node<<2|f] = pnode
135      arr[nnode] = gnode
136      arr[node<<2|2] = arr[gnode<<2|2]
137      arr[gnode<<2|2] = nnode>>2
138      arr[arr[pnode<<2|f^1]<<2|2] = pnode
139      arr[arr[gnode<<2|f^g^1]<<2|2] = gnode
140      arr[pnode<<2|2] = node
141      _update_triple(gnode, pnode, node)
142      pnode = arr[node<<2|2]
143      if arr[pnode<<2] == gnode:
144        arr[pnode<<2] = node
145      elif arr[pnode<<2|1] == gnode:
146        arr[pnode<<2|1] = node
147      else:
148        return
149    _propagate(pnode)
150    _propagate(node)
151    f = arr[pnode<<2] == node
152    arr[pnode<<2|f^1] = arr[node<<2|f]
153    arr[node<<2|f] = pnode
154    arr[arr[pnode<<2|f^1]<<2|2] = pnode
155    arr[node<<2|2] = arr[pnode<<2|2]
156    arr[pnode<<2|2] = node
157    self._update_double(pnode, node)
158


[ドキュメント]
159  def expose(self, v: int) -> int:
160    ''' vが属する木において、その木の根->vのパスを構築
161    '''
162    arr, n, _splay, _update = self.arr, self.n, self._splay, self._update
163    pre = v
164    while arr[v<<2|2] != n:
165      _splay(v)
166      arr[v<<2|1] = n
167      _update(v)
168      if arr[v<<2|2] == n:
169        break
170      pre = arr[v<<2|2]
171      _splay(pre)
172      arr[pre<<2|1] = v
173      _update(pre)
174    arr[v<<2|1] = n
175    _update(v)
176    return pre


177


[ドキュメント]
178  def lca(self, u: int, v: int, root: int=-1) -> int:
179    if root != -1:
180      self.evert(root)
181    self.expose(u)
182    return self.expose(v)


183


[ドキュメント]
184  def link(self, c: int, p: int) -> None:
185    ''' c->pの辺を追加する / cは元の木の根でなければならない
186    '''
187    assert not self.same(c, p)
188    self.expose(c)
189    self.expose(p)
190    self.arr[c<<2|2] = p
191    self.arr[p<<2|1] = c
192    self._update(p)
193    self.group_cnt -= 1


194


[ドキュメント]
195  def cut(self, c: int) -> None:
196    ''' cとpar[c]の間の辺を削除する / cは元の木の根であってはいけない
197    '''
198    arr = self.arr
199    self.expose(c)
200    assert arr[c<<2] != self.n
201    arr[arr[c<<2]<<2|2] = self.n
202    arr[c<<2] = self.n
203    self._update(c)
204    self.group_cnt += 1


205


[ドキュメント]
206  def group_count(self) -> int:
207    return self.group_cnt


208


[ドキュメント]
209  def root(self, v: int) -> int:
210    ''' vが属する木の根を返す
211    '''
212    self.expose(v)
213    arr, n = self.arr, self.n
214    while arr[v<<2] != n:
215      v = arr[v<<2]
216      self._propagate(v)
217    self._splay(v)
218    return v


219


[ドキュメント]
220  def same(self, u: int, v: int) -> bool:
221    ''' uとvが同じ連結成分であるかを返す
222    '''
223    return self.root(u) == self.root(v)


224


[ドキュメント]
225  def evert(self, v: int) -> None:
226    ''' vが属する元の木の根をvにする
227    expose→一番右→反転フラグ
228    evert後、vは遅延伝播済み(何かと便利なので)
229    '''
230    self.expose(v)
231    self.arr[v<<2|3] ^= 1
232    self._propagate(v)


233


[ドキュメント]
234  def merge(self, u: int, v: int) -> bool:
235    ''' 辺[u - v]を追加する 既に同じ連結成分にいた場合はreturn
236    '''
237    if self.same(u, v): return False
238    self.evert(u)
239    self.expose(v)
240    self.arr[u<<2|2] = v
241    self.arr[v<<2|1] = u
242    self._update(v)
243    self.group_cnt -= 1
244    return True


245


[ドキュメント]
246  def split(self, u: int, v: int) -> bool:
247    ''' 辺[u - v]を削除する
248    '''
249    self.evert(u)
250    self.cut(v)
251    return True


252


[ドキュメント]
253  def path_prod(self, u: int, v: int) -> T:
254    ''' パス[u -> v]間の総積を返す
255    非可換に対応
256    '''
257    self.evert(u)
258    self.expose(v)
259    return self.data[v<<1]


260


[ドキュメント]
261  def path_apply(self, u: int, v: int, f: F) -> None:
262    self.evert(u)
263    self.expose(v)
264    self.key[v] = self.mapping(f, self.key[v])
265    self.data[v<<1] = self.mapping(f, self.data[v<<1])
266    self.data[v<<1|1] = self.mapping(f, self.data[v<<1|1])
267    self.lazy[v] = f if self.lazy[v] == self.id else self.composition(f, self.lazy[v])
268    self._propagate(v)


269


[ドキュメント]
270  def path_length(self, u: int, v: int) -> int:
271    self.evert(u)
272    self.expose(v)
273    return self.size[v]


274


[ドキュメント]
275  def path_kth_elm(self, s: int, t: int, k: int) -> int:
276    ''' path[s -> t]のk番目の頂点番号を取得する
277    '''
278    self.evert(s)
279    self.expose(t)
280    if self.size[t] <= k:
281      return -1
282    size, arr = self.size, self.arr
283    while True:
284      self._propagate(t)
285      s = size[arr[t<<2]]
286      if s == k:
287        self._splay(t)
288        return t
289      t = arr[t<<2|(s<k)]
290      if s < k:
291        k -= s + 1


292


[ドキュメント]
293  def path_max_right(self, s: int, t: int, f: Callable[[T], bool]) -> int:
294    return -1


295


[ドキュメント]
296  def path_min_left(self, s: int, t: int, f: Callable[[T], bool]) -> int:
297    return -1


298
299  def __setitem__(self, k: int, v: T):
300    self._splay(k)
301    self.key[k] = v
302    self._update(k)
303
304  def __getitem__(self, k: int) -> T:
305    self._splay(k)
306    return self.key[k]
307
308  def __str__(self):
309    return str([self[i] for i in range(self.n)])
310
311  __repr__ = __str__
